    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(Canvas canvas)
        Drawing a command. A command is a KeyMap with the following pairs type={line, image, ..., composed} x=[] array of integers with the x coordinates of the start (x[0]) and end (x[1]) points of the line y=[] array of integers with the y coordinates of the start (y[0]) and end (y[1]) points of the line color=rgba value (optional)
        Specified by:
        draw in interface Drawable
